title: Three-dimensional bicontinuous ultrafast-charge and -discharge bulk battery electrodes
title_cn: 三维双连续超快充放电大容量电池电极
abstract: Rapid charge and discharge rates have become an important feature of electrical energy storage devices, but cause dramatic reductions in the energy that can be stored or delivered by most rechargeable batteries (their energy capacity). Supercapacitors do not suffer from this problem, but are restricted to much lower stored energy per mass (energy density) than batteries. A storage technology that combines the rate performance of supercapacitors with the energy density of batteries would significantly advance portable and distributed power technology. Here, we demonstrate very large battery charge and discharge rates with minimal capacity loss by using cathodes made from a self-assembled three-dimensional bicontinuous nanoarchitecture consisting of an electrolytically active material sandwiched between rapid ion and electron transport pathways. Rates of up to 400C and 1,000C for lithium-ion and nickel-metal hydride chemistries, respectively, are achieved (where a 1C rate represents a one-hour complete charge or discharge), enabling fabrication of a lithium-ion battery that can be 90% charged in 2 minutes.
abstract_cn: 快速的充电和放电速率已经成为电能存储设备的重要特征，但是却导致大多数可再充电电池可以存储或传递的能量（其能量容量）急剧下降。超级电容器不受此问题困扰，但被限制为每单位质量（能量密度）比电池低得多的存储能量。将超级电容器的速率性能与电池的能量密度相结合的存储技术将大大推动便携式和分布式电源技术的发展。在这里，我们通过使用由自组装的三维双连续纳米体系结构制成的阴极展示了非常大的电池充电和放电速率，并具有最小的容量损失，该阴极由夹在快速离子和电子传输路径之间的电解活性材料组成。分别实现了锂离子和镍氢氢化物化学反应的最高温度400C和1,000C（其中1C速度代表一小时的完全充电或放电时间），从而可以制造出可2分钟内充电90％。

title: Scalable nanostructured membranes for solid-oxide fuel cells
title_cn: 用于固体氧化物燃料电池的可扩展纳米结构膜
abstract: The use of oxide fuel cells and other solid-state ionic devices in energy applications is limited by their requirement for elevated operating temperatures, typically above 800 °C (ref. ). Thin-film membranes allow low-temperature operation by reducing the ohmic resistance of the electrolytes. However, although proof-of-concept thin-film devices have been demonstrated, scaling up remains a significant challenge because large-area membranes less than ∼100 nm thick are susceptible to mechanical failure. Here, we report that nanoscale yttria-stabilized zirconia membranes with lateral dimensions on the scale of millimetres or centimetres can be made thermomechanically stable by depositing metallic grids on them to function as mechanical supports. We combine such a membrane with a nanostructured dense oxide cathode to make a thin-film solid-oxide fuel cell that can achieve a power density of 155 mW cm–2 at 510 °C. We also report a total power output of more than 20 mW from a single fuel-cell chip. Our large-area membranes could also be relevant to electrochemical energy applications such as gas separation, hydrogen production and permeation membranes.
abstract_cn: 氧化物燃料电池和其他固态离子设备在能源应用中的使用受到其对升高的工作温度（通常高于800摄氏度（参考温度））的要求的限制。薄膜可通过降低电解质的欧姆电阻来实现低温运行。但是，尽管已经证明了概念验证的薄膜设备，但按比例放大仍然是一个重大挑战，因为小于100 nm厚的大面积膜容易发生机械故障。在这里，我们报道，通过在其上沉积金属网格以用作机械支撑，可以使横向尺寸为毫米或厘米的纳米级氧化钇稳定的氧化锆膜热力学稳定。我们将这种膜与纳米结构的致密氧化物阴极相结合，以制造出一种薄膜固体氧化物燃料电池，该燃料电池在510°＃160处可实现155 mW cm <sup>＆＃8211; 2 </ sup>的功率密度＃176; C。我们还报告称，单个燃料电池芯片的总功率输出超过20＆＃160mW。我们的大面积膜也可能与电化学能源应用有关，例如气体分离，制氢和渗透膜。</ p>

title: Nanoscale Joule heating, Peltier cooling and current crowding at graphene–metal contacts
title_cn: 纳米焦耳加热，珀耳帖冷却和石墨烯-金属接触处的电流拥挤
abstract: The performance and scaling of graphene-based electronics is limited by the quality of contacts between the graphene and metal electrodes. However, the nature of graphene–metal contacts remains incompletely understood. Here, we use atomic force microscopy to measure the temperature distributions at the contacts of working graphene transistors with a spatial resolution of ∼10 nm (refs), allowing us to identify the presence of Joule heating, current crowding and thermoelectric heating and cooling. Comparison with simulation enables extraction of the contact resistivity (150–200 Ω µm2) and transfer length (0.2–0.5 µm) in our devices; these generally limit performance and must be minimized. Our data indicate that thermoelectric effects account for up to one-third of the contact temperature changes, and that current crowding accounts for most of the remainder. Modelling predicts that the role of current crowding will diminish and the role of thermoelectric effects will increase as contacts improve.
abstract_cn: 石墨烯基电子产品的性能和规模受石墨烯与金属电极之间接触质量的限制。但是，石墨烯金属触点的性质仍未完全理解。在这里，我们使用原子力显微镜来测量工作石墨烯晶体管的触点处的温度分布，其空间分辨率为＆＃8764; 10 nm（参考），从而使我们能够识别出焦耳热，电流拥挤和热电加热的存在。冷却。与仿真比较可以提取接触电阻率（150＆＃8211; 200＆＃160;＆＃937;＆＃160;＆＃181; m 2 ）和传输长度（0.2＆＃8211; 0.5 ＆＃160;＆＃181; m）在我们的设备中；这些通常会限制性能，必须将其最小化。我们的数据表明，热电效应最多占接触温度变化的三分之一，而电流拥挤占其余大部分。模型预测，随着接触的改善，电流拥挤的作用将减小，热电效应的作用将增加。

title: Nanoparticles reduce nickel allergy by capturing metal ions
title_cn: 纳米粒子通过捕获金属离子减少镍过敏
abstract: Approximately 10% of the population in the USA suffer from nickel allergy, and many are unable to wear jewellery or handle coins and other objects that contain nickel. Many agents have been developed to reduce the penetration of nickel through skin, but few formulations are safe and effective. Here, we show that applying a thin layer of glycerine emollient containing nanoparticles of either calcium carbonate or calcium phosphate on an isolated piece of pig skin (in vitro) and on the skin of mice (in vivo) prevents the penetration of nickel ions into the skin. The nanoparticles capture nickel ions by cation exchange, and remain on the surface of the skin, allowing them to be removed by simple washing with water. Approximately 11-fold fewer nanoparticles by mass are required to achieve the same efficacy as the chelating agent ethylenediamine tetraacetic acid. Using nanoparticles with diameters smaller than 500 nm in topical creams may be an effective way to limit the exposure to metal ions that can cause skin irritation.
abstract_cn: 在美国，约有10％的人口患有镍过敏症，其中许多人无法佩戴首饰或搬运硬币和其他含镍物品。已经开发出许多试剂来减少镍通过皮肤的渗透，但是很少有制剂是安全有效的。在这里，我们表明，在分离出的猪皮上（体外）和在小鼠皮肤上（体内）应用含有碳酸钙或磷酸钙纳米颗粒的甘油润肤剂薄层，可以防止镍离子渗透到猪体内。皮肤。纳米粒子通过阳离子交换捕获镍离子，并保留在皮肤表面，通过简单的水洗即可去除。要获得与螯合剂乙二胺四乙酸相同的功效，所需的纳米颗粒质量应减少约11倍。在局部乳膏中使用直径小于500纳米的纳米颗粒可能是限制暴露于会引起皮肤刺激的金属离子的有效方法。

title: A stretchable carbon nanotube strain sensor for human-motion detection
title_cn: 用于人体运动检测的可拉伸碳纳米管应变传感器
abstract: Devices made from stretchable electronic materials could be incorporated into clothing or attached directly to the body. Such materials have typically been prepared by engineering conventional rigid materials such as silicon, rather than by developing new materials. Here, we report a class of wearable and stretchable devices fabricated from thin films of aligned single-walled carbon nanotubes. When stretched, the nanotube films fracture into gaps and islands, and bundles bridging the gaps. This mechanism allows the films to act as strain sensors capable of measuring strains up to 280% (50 times more than conventional metal strain gauges), with high durability, fast response and low creep. We assembled the carbon-nanotube sensors on stockings, bandages and gloves to fabricate devices that can detect different types of human motion, including movement, typing, breathing and speech.
abstract_cn: 由可伸缩电子材料制成的设备可以集成到衣服中或直接连接到身体。 这样的材料通常是通过工程化常规的刚性材料（例如硅）而不是通过开发新材料来制备的。 在这里，我们报告了一类由对齐的单壁碳纳米管薄膜制成的可穿戴设备。 当拉伸时，纳米管膜破裂成间隙和岛，并且成束桥接间隙。 这种机制使薄膜可以作为应变传感器，能够测量高达280％的应变（是传统金属应变仪的50倍），具有高耐用性，快速响应和低蠕变的特性。 我们在袜子，绷带和手套上组装了碳纳米管传感器，制造出可以检测人类不同类型的运动的设备，包括运动，打字，呼吸和言语。

title: Hydrogen production from formic acid decomposition at room temperature using a Ag–Pd core–shell nanocatalyst
title_cn: 使用Ag-Pd核-壳纳米催化剂在室温下分解甲酸制氢
abstract: Formic acid (HCOOH) has great potential as an in situ source of hydrogen for fuel cells, because it offers high energy density, is non-toxic and can be safely handled in aqueous solution. So far, there has been a lack of solid catalysts that are sufficiently active and/or selective for hydrogen production from formic acid at room temperature. Here, we report that Ag nanoparticles coated with a thin layer of Pd atoms can significantly enhance the production of H2 from formic acid at ambient temperature. Atom probe tomography confirmed that the nanoparticles have a core–shell configuration, with the shell containing between 1 and 10 layers of Pd atoms. The Pd shell contains terrace sites and is electronically promoted by the Ag core, leading to significantly enhanced catalytic properties. Our nanocatalysts could be used in the development of micro polymer electrolyte membrane fuel cells for portable devices and could also be applied in the promotion of other catalytic reactions under mild conditions.
abstract_cn: 甲酸作为燃料电池原位氢源具有巨大潜力，因为它具有高能量密度，无毒且可以在水溶液中安全处理的优点。迄今为止，缺乏对于在室温下由甲酸生产氢具有足够活性和/或选择性的固体催化剂。在此，我们报道了在室温下涂覆有一层Pd原子薄层的Ag纳米颗粒可以显着提高甲酸生成H <sub> 2 </ sub>的能力。原子探针层析成像证实纳米颗粒具有核壳结构，该壳包含1到10层Pd原子。 Pd壳包含平台部位，并且由Ag核电子促进，从而显着增强了催化性能。我们的纳米催化剂可用于便携式设备的微聚合物电解质膜燃料电池的开发，也可用于在温和条件下促进其他催化反应。</ p>

title: A high-throughput label-free nanoparticle analyser
title_cn: 高通量的无标记纳米颗粒分析仪
abstract: Synthetic nanoparticles and genetically modified viruses are used in a range of applications, but high-throughput analytical tools for the physical characterization of these objects are needed. Here we present a microfluidic analyser that detects individual nanoparticles and characterizes complex, unlabelled nanoparticle suspensions. We demonstrate the detection, concentration analysis and sizing of individual synthetic nanoparticles in a multicomponent mixture with sufficient throughput to analyse 500,000 particles per second. We also report the rapid size and titre analysis of unlabelled bacteriophage T7 in both salt solution and mouse blood plasma, using just ∼1 × 10−6 l of analyte. Unexpectedly, in the native blood plasma we discover a large background of naturally occurring nanoparticles with a power-law size distribution. The high-throughput detection capability, scalable fabrication and simple electronics of this instrument make it well suited for diverse applications.
abstract_cn: 合成的纳米颗粒和转基因病毒被广泛应用，但是需要用于这些物体物理表征的高通量分析工具。在这里，我们介绍了一种微流体分析仪，可检测单个纳米颗粒并表征复杂的，未标记的纳米颗粒悬浮液。我们展示了多组分混合物中单个合成纳米颗粒的检测，浓度分析和尺寸，其吞吐量足以分析每秒500,000个颗粒。我们还报告了盐溶液和小鼠血浆中未标记的噬菌体T7的快速大小和滴定度分析，仅使用＆＃8764; 1＆＃215; 10 <sup>＆＃8722; 6 </ sup>＆＃160; l分析物。出乎意料的是，在天然血浆中，我们发现了具有幂律尺寸分布的自然存在的纳米粒子的大背景。该仪器的高通量检测功能，可扩展的制造和简单的电子器件使其非常适合各种应用。</ p>

title: Quantification of protein interactions and solution transport using high-density GMR sensor arrays
title_cn: 使用高密度GMR传感器阵列定量蛋白质相互作用和溶液运输
abstract: Monitoring the kinetics of protein interactions on a high-density sensor array is vital to drug development and proteomic analysis. Label-free kinetic assays based on surface plasmon resonance are the current gold standard, but they have poor detection limits, suffer from non-specific binding, and are not amenable to high-throughput analyses. Here, we show that magnetically responsive nanosensors that have been scaled to over 100,000 sensors per cm2 can be used to measure the binding kinetics of various proteins with high spatial and temporal resolution. We present an analytical model that describes the binding of magnetically labelled antibodies to proteins that are immobilized on the sensor surface. This model is able to quantify the kinetics of antibody–antigen binding at sensitivities as low as 20 zeptomoles of solute.
abstract_cn: 在高密度传感器阵列上监测蛋白质相互作用的动力学对于药物开发和蛋白质组学分析至关重要。 目前，基于表面等离振子共振的无标记动力学分析是目前的金标准，但它们的检测限很低，受非特异性结合的影响，不适合进行高通量分析。 在这里，我们显示了已被缩放到每cm 2 超过100,000个传感器的磁响应纳米传感器可用于测量具有高时空分辨率的各种蛋白质的结合动力学。 我们提供了一种分析模型，该模型描述了磁性标记的抗体与固定在传感器表面的蛋白质的结合。 该模型能够定量分析低至20溶质的分子摩尔浓度的抗体抗原结合动力学。

title: Silica and titanium dioxide nanoparticles cause pregnancy complications in mice
title_cn: 二氧化硅和二氧化钛纳米颗粒导致小鼠怀孕并发症
abstract: The increasing use of nanomaterials has raised concerns about their potential risks to human health. Recent studies have shown that nanoparticles can cross the placenta barrier in pregnant mice and cause neurotoxicity in their offspring, but a more detailed understanding of the effects of nanoparticles on pregnant animals remains elusive. Here, we show that silica and titanium dioxide nanoparticles with diameters of 70 nm and 35 nm, respectively, can cause pregnancy complications when injected intravenously into pregnant mice. The silica and titanium dioxide nanoparticles were found in the placenta, fetal liver and fetal brain. Mice treated with these nanoparticles had smaller uteri and smaller fetuses than untreated controls. Fullerene molecules and larger (300 and 1,000 nm) silica particles did not induce these complications. These detrimental effects are linked to structural and functional abnormalities in the placenta on the maternal side, and are abolished when the surfaces of the silica nanoparticles are modified with carboxyl and amine groups.
abstract_cn: 纳米材料的日益使用引起了人们对其对人类健康的潜在风险的关注。最近的研究表明，纳米颗粒可以越过怀孕小鼠的胎盘屏障并对其后代造成神经毒性，但是对纳米颗粒对怀孕动物的影响的更详细的了解仍然难以捉摸。在这里，我们显示了直径分别为70纳米和35纳米的二氧化硅和二氧化钛纳米颗粒，当静脉注射到怀孕的小鼠体内时会引起怀孕并发症。在胎盘，胎儿肝脏和胎儿脑中发现了二氧化硅和二氧化钛纳米颗粒。与未治疗的对照组相比，用这些纳米颗粒治疗的小鼠子宫较小，胎儿较小。富勒烯分子和较大的（300和1,000＆＃160; nm）二氧化硅颗粒不会引起这些并发症。这些有害作用与母体胎盘的结构和功能异常有关，而当二氧化硅纳米粒子的表面被羧基和胺基改性时，这些有害作用将被消除。
